title: Nazara Tech's arm Nodwin approves acquisition of 35% of Brandscale Innovations - Economic Times
content: Nazara Tech's arm Nodwin approves acquisition of 35% of Brandscale Innovations  Economic Times
description: Listed entity Nazara Technologies on Tuesday informed exchanges that its arm Nodwin Gaming has approved the acquisition of a 35% stake in Brandscale Innovations for around Rs 10 crore.
